attributes.action: push for MP's to face criminal charges over expenses claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The department for Work & Pensions (DWP) state "We’re closing in. And when we catch you, you could face a prison sentence." This is the message sent out to millions of normal UK citizens, a threat from the government to deter us from doing what they have been doing for years. I am sure that if you or I were caught defrauding the government for thousands a simple "I'm Sorry" would not be sufficient to close the matter. Let’s stand up to these bullies from the top whose motto surely must be "don't do as I do as I say". 
We want criminal charges to be brought against all MP's who have abused the system as well as them paying the monies back and being fined.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
